summary: This is an email forwarding a Palm Beach Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal, sent from an unknown sender to an individual named Nand. The email includes the article as an attachment and mentions the Assistant U.S. Attorney's office address in West Palm Beach.

persons.name: Nand
persons.context: The email is addressed to Nand, who is receiving information about an article regarding Epstein's plea deal.

events.title: Palm Beach Daily News Article Publication
events.description: An article about Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal was published in the Palm Beach Daily News.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: An email dated January 3, 2008, forwards a Palm Beach Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal.
The email is sent to an individual named Nand, indicating communication about the case outside legal channels.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney's office address in West Palm Beach is referenced, linking to the prosecution of Epstein's case.
